SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_NXS_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! Base URL : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_BASE_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -baseurl &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! UserName : IF &UC4RB_NXS_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_NXS_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD# <> "--10" OR "" : PRINT "The Password parameter cannot be specified without specifying the Username." : STOP MSG, 50, "The Password parameter cannot be specified without specifying the Username." : ENDIF : ENDIF
! Password : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : IF &UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD# <> "--10" OR "" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_NXS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_NXS_CMD#, " -ssl &UC4RB_NXS_SSL_VALIDATION#")
! Load package parameters : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PUB.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS@WIN
